name: The Tree Of Life (joggy555)
description:
The Tree Of Life

The tree of life is a short game that I created for a Godot game jam.

You play as new soul that entered the realm of shadows, your objective is to help as many lost souls as you can get back to the tree of life. 

The more souls you help, the bigger the tree becomes and the closer you get to finish the game.

To make your shots stronger, you need to collect the dark artifacts that are scattered all over the realm.

 All of the artifacts are hidden, use your light to find them.

Game controls:

To move - WASD

jump - Space bar

crouch - Ctrl

Light (To find artifects) - F

Shoot - Left mouse button

Game Music By

Labyrinth of Lost Dreams by Darren Curtis | https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/
Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/
